title: 希望提供%!password%进行urlencode编码的解决方案
author: e345
body_snippet:
这篇文章提到的问题并不是通用解决方案：
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/1411
其中%!password%并没有解决复杂密码登录winscp的问题，希望能够提供urlencode的编码方法，例如可以考虑使用两个感叹号表示urlencode转码：%!!password%
让错误的密码： scp://root:“J4Lk:;7=0!S>>/”@172.28.3.151:22
转换为正确的： scp://root:“J4Lk%3a%3b7%3d0!S%3e%3e%2f”@172.28.3.151:22

iterations.description: Feature request for URL-encoded token variant (e.g. %+password%) so passwords with special characters work in URLs passed to external tools

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet:
We can add this as a new feature. The variable system has never supported this before. It shouldn't be too hard to add, though I don't know when we will get to it. This might be a good feature for new community members to help with (if anyone is interested).

（谷歌翻译）
我们可以将其添加为新功能。 变量系统以前从未支持过这个。 它不应该太难添加，但我不知道什么时候会达到它。 对于新社区成员来说，这可能是一个很好的功能（如果有人有兴趣的话）。

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request for URL-encoded token variant (e.g. %+password%) so passwords with special characters work in URLs passed to external tools
Approach: Add a new EscapeType.UrlEncode triggered by a prefix character (e.g. '+'), then apply Uri.EscapeDataString() to the replacement value in BuildReplacementList, alongside existing shell-escape and no-escape modes
